localize.text: Manager, I want you to choose one of three letters from the alphabet. A, B, or C.
So you've picked one? Good. Now listen carefully.
'A' is a good letter. My name starts with it as well.
People who choose A are sensitive to others' opinions about them and are results-oriented. As such, you are an excellent listener. People will flock to you.
So you've picked one? Good. Now listen carefully.
People who choose B are detail-oriented. Rational and realistic. Some may even be materialistic. However your traits will lead you to success.
I don’t really like the letter 'B.'
So you've picked one? Good. Now listen carefully.

People who choose C believe that the process is more important than the outcome. Therefore they are good at planning and enjoy change. You will be able to gain insight without being confined by the rules.
This is a new pastime among the employees. I find it uninteresting.
There are no scientific observations. It's just good for passing the time.
Whether I would have been this or that kind of a person if I were human.
Is it odd for me to think about that?
